title: Typofonderie.com Font Discoveries Program: July-September 2009
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020213204im_/http:/typophile.com/files/4fonts_july2009_5198.png)

Every two months, we offer a font discovery pack at a very affordable price compared to regular prices when purchased with the rest of a family. From € 98. You save approximately 30%.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020213204im_/http:/typophile.com/files/4fonts_a_july2009_5846.png)

This new Font Discoveries pack is a good way to discover our fonts at an affordable price. [Jump on the July-September 2009 Font Discoveries](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020213204/http:/www.typofonderie.com/alphabets/fontdiscoveries/fonts_july2009) for more info about the 4 fonts included: Le Monde Sans PTF Light, Ambroise Std Firmin Demi, Anisette Std Black, Angie Sans Std Bold Italic. [The available pdf present the 4 fonts(July 2009 Font Discoveries pdf specimen](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020213204/http:/www.typofonderie.com/icono/alphabets/pdf/FontDiscoveriesJuly2009.pdf) in various contexts, samples in use, glyph sets and and so on.

[Font Discoveries page](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020213204/http:/www.typofonderie.com/alphabets/special_offers/fontdiscoveries)  
 [Font Discoveries July 2009](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020213204/http:/www.typofonderie.com/alphabets/special_offers/fontdiscoveriesjuly2009)  
 [Font Discoveries July 2009 pdf specimen](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020213204/http:/www.typofonderie.com/icono/alphabets/pdf/FontDiscoveriesJuly2009.pdf)  
 [Font Discoveries July-September 2009: in use samples](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020213204/http:/www.porchez.com/article/540/font-discoveries-july-september-2009-in-use-samples)
